data.actual_result: Embed shows information for the article that follows the /, for example "X" and "Linux-libre"
data.expected_result: Embed shows information for the article link in message
data.short_description: Wikipedia embeds show wrong article if linked article title has a forward slash in it
data.steps_to_repro: - Find wikipedia article with forward slash in title, for example "Cygwin/X" or "Parabola GNU/Linux-libre" - Paste article link into Discord
